name: Revoke Refresh Token
description: This API is used to revoke the refresh token access and that revoked token can not be used further to refresh access token.

Template Params.name: oauthappname
Template Params.description: The name for the Oauth App you have configured in the LoginRadius Admin Console.

Body Params.name: refresh_token
Body Params.description: this is the refresh_token you received when you used the 'Access token by OAuth 2 token' or 'Access Token by Account Password' API calls
